mobi.cangol.mobile.service.cache

类 CacheManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobi.cangol.mobile.service.cache.CacheManagerImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AppService, CacheManager

    @Service(value="CacheManager")
public class CacheManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheManager
    作者:
    Cangol
